TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PathGradientBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class PathGradientBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class PathGradientBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 封裝填滿內部的物件使用漸層的物件。

span.span: Encapsulates a object that fills the interior of a object with a gradient.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之色彩漸層是從路徑中心點的色彩路徑的外部界限邊緣平滑陰影。The color gradient is a smooth shading of colors from the center point of the path to the outside boundary edge of the path. Blend 因素、 職位和漸層的開始和結束位置的樣式會影響，以及如何快速變化的。Blend factors, positions, and style affect where the gradient starts and ends, and how fast it changes shade. 未遵循路徑漸層筆刷屬性物件，用來進行繪製。Path gradient brushes do not obey the property of the object used to do the drawing. 使用填滿的區域不論平滑模式的物件會呈現相同的方式 （別名）。Areas filled using a object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the smoothing mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立。The following code example shows how to create a . 此範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要e，也就是參數的。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires the e, which is a parameter of . remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含對應的漸變因數和位置的陣列。A contains corresponding arrays of blend factors and positions. 漸變因數會指定開始色彩和結束色彩的對應位置使用的百分比。The blend factors specify the percentages of the starting color and ending color to use at the corresponding position. 提供位置的漸層停駐路徑的距離百分比。The positions are given as a percentage of distance along the gradient path.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成一個矩形，但它可能是大部分的任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 將中心色彩設定為紅色和藍色周圍的色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕在套用 multiply 轉換之前。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the multiply transform. - 建立旋轉 90 度的筆刷，並將它轉譯，以 100 的兩個座標軸的 s 矩陣。Creates s matrix that rotates the brush 90 degrees and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 此矩陣使用套用至筆刷方法。Applies this matrix to the brush by using the method. - 將筆刷繪製到螢幕。Draws the brush to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成一個矩形，但它可能是大部分的任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 將中心色彩設定為紅色和藍色周圍的色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕之前套用旋轉轉換。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the rotate transform. - 旋轉轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the rotate transform to the brush by using its method. - 繪製到螢幕的旋轉的筆刷 （矩形）。Draws the rotated brush (rectangle) to the screen. 請注意，下方的矩形相較於在轉譯之前所繪製的旋轉 45 度。Notice that the bottom rectangle is rotated 45 degrees as compared to the one drawn prior to the translation. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 程式碼The code - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成一個矩形，但它可能是大部分的任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 將中心色彩設定為紅色和藍色周圍的色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕之前套用的擴展轉換。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the scale transform. - 縮放轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the scale transform to the brush by using its method. - 呼叫將筆刷矩形移動，使它不會不覆疊是稍早繪製到螢幕的方法。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 將轉換的筆刷矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the translated brush rectangle to the screen. 請注意，下方的矩形是倍時間以做為 x 軸會在轉譯之前所繪製。Notice that the bottom rectangle is twice as long in the x-axis as is the one drawn prior to the translation. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和線型減少來一個環繞色彩建立漸層。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到指定的位置，沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形，中心色彩達到最大濃度的 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值為 1 （預設值） 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和線型減少來一個環繞色彩建立漸層。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多個色彩陣列，陣列中的第一個色彩用於的結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 筆刷的界限路徑上的不連續點會使用此陣列中指定的色彩。The colors specified in this array are used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 `.`For an example, see `.`

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBlendTriangularShape (float focus, float scale);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus, float32 scale) cil managed
Public Sub SetBlendTriangularShape (focus As Single, scale As Single)
public: void SetBlendTriangularShape(float focus, float scale);

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到指定的位置，沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形，中心色彩達到最大濃度的 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值為 1 （預設值） 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

param.name: scale
param.span: 從 0 到 1，指定使用邊界色彩漸變之中心色彩的最大濃度的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.

param.span: 值 1 會讓中心色彩的最大的可能濃度，它是預設值。

span.span: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.

summary.span: 使用中心色彩和線型減少來每個環繞色彩建立漸層。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to each surrounding color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多個色彩陣列，陣列中的第一個色彩用於的結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於將筆刷的界限路徑上的不連續點的色彩。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 根據預設，當您從路徑漸層的界限移至中心點，色彩會逐漸從邊界色彩為中心的色彩。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 您可以自訂的定位和混合的界限和中心色彩，其方式呼叫這個方法。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成一個矩形，但它可能是大部分的任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 將中心色彩設定為紅色和藍色周圍的色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕在套用 blend 轉換之前。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the blend transform. - Blend 轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the blend transform to the brush by using its method. - 呼叫將筆刷矩形移動，使它不會不覆疊是稍早繪製到螢幕的方法。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 轉換的筆刷繪製的矩形會繪製到螢幕。Draws the transformed-brush rectangle is drawn to the screen. 請注意，最大的中心色彩 （紅色） 所在的一半從中心路徑的路徑界限。Notice that the maximum center color (red) is located half way from the center of the path to the path boundary. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 建立中心色彩和根據鐘型曲線的第一個環繞色彩之間的漸層減少。

span.span: Creates a gradient falloff between the center color and the first surrounding color based on a bell-shaped curve.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSigmaBellShape(float32 focus) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到指定的位置，沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形，中心色彩達到最大濃度的 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值為 1 （預設值） 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

summary.span: 建立變更開始從中央向外的路徑的路徑界限的色彩漸層筆刷。

span.span: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.

summary.span: 從一種色彩轉換到另一個根據鐘型曲線。

span.span: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多個色彩陣列，陣列中的第一個色彩用於的結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於將筆刷的界限路徑上的不連續點的色彩。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 根據預設，當您從路徑漸層的界限移至中心點，色彩會逐漸從邊界色彩為中心的色彩。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 您可以自訂的定位和混合的界限和中心色彩，其方式呼叫這個方法。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSigmaBellShape (float focus, float scale);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSigmaBellShape(float32 focus, float32 scale) cil managed
Public Sub SetSigmaBellShape (focus As Single, scale As Single)
public: void SetSigmaBellShape(float focus, float scale);

param.name: focus
param.span: 從 0 到指定的位置，沿著從路徑中心至路徑邊界的任何圓形，中心色彩達到最大濃度的 1 的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 值為 1 （預設值） 會將最大濃度置於路徑的中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

param.name: scale
param.span: 從 0 到 1，指定使用邊界色彩漸變之中心色彩的最大濃度的值。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.

param.span: 值 1 會讓中心色彩的最大的可能濃度，它是預設值。

span.span: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.

summary.span: 建立變更開始從中央向外的路徑的路徑界限的色彩漸層筆刷。

span.span: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.

span.span: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多個色彩陣列，陣列中的第一個色彩用於的結束色彩。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此陣列中指定的色彩會用於將筆刷的界限路徑上的不連續點的色彩。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 根據預設，當您從路徑漸層的界限移至中心點，色彩會逐漸從邊界色彩為中心的色彩。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 您可以自訂的定位和混合的界限和中心色彩，其方式呼叫這個方法。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑，並新增一個矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 建立從路徑點 （在此範例中，點會形成一個矩形，但它可能是大部分的任何圖形）。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 將中心色彩設定為紅色和藍色周圍的色彩。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 繪製螢幕在套用 blend 轉換之前。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the blend transform. - Blend 轉換套用到筆刷，方式是使用其方法。Applies the blend transform to the brush by using its method. - 呼叫將筆刷矩形移動，使它不會不覆疊是稍早繪製到螢幕的方法。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 將轉換的筆刷矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the transformed-brush rectangle to the screen. 請注意，最大的中心色彩 （紅色） 所在的一半從中心路徑的路徑界限。Notice that the maximum center color (red) is located half way from the center of the path to the path boundary. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得或設定色彩陣列，這對應至路徑中的點填滿。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of colors that correspond to the points in the path this fills.

value.span: 陣列結構，表示每個相關聯的色彩在路徑中指出這點填滿。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the colors associated with each point in the path this fills.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個在陣列對應至路徑中的點。Each in the array corresponds to a point in the path.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ Transform { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::Matrix ^ value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定一份定義局部幾何轉換這個。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the that defines a local geometric transform for this .

value.span: 一份，定義只套用至與這個繪製填色的幾何轉換。

span.span: A copy of the that defines a geometric transform that applies only to fills drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要轉譯、 調整、 旋轉或扭曲漸層填滿可用的幾何轉換。A geometric transform can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the gradient fill. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性是筆刷的幾何轉換的複本，當您不再需要時，您應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 指定的轉換套用至區域幾何轉換。

span.span: Applies the specified translation to the local geometric transform.

summary.span: 這個方法預先規劃轉換的轉換。

span.span: This method prepends the translation to the transform.
